subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: John Degenkolb of Germany won a mass sprint to take the fourth stage of the Critérium du Dauphiné, and Bradley Wiggins of Britain retained the leader’s yellow jersey.
snippet: John Degenkolb of Germany won a mass sprint to take the fourth stage of the Critérium du Dauphiné, and Bradley Wiggins of Britain retained the leader’s yellow jersey.
